Row.Text: The Earth Kingdom is enduring and strong. The Earth Monarch rules the diverse nation from Ba Sing Se, The Impenetrable City. The Earth Kingdom's massive cities are centers of international trade with extensive agricultural centers to feed their growing populations. Those who try to breach the Outer Wall will meet the fierce resistance of the Earthbenders. Fortify and let the world see the might of the Earth Kingdom.
From the impenetrable walls of Ba Sing Se, the Earth Kingdom steadies itself and prepares for the future. What will that future hold?

The World's Farm Unique Ability removes Specialist Food maintenance, while the Feed the Queen Tradition and the Earth Monarch Palace increase Specialist yields. Grow your Cities quickly with Specialized Towns to take advantage of these Specialist bonuses.
